["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"Bioconductor 为高通量基因组数据的分析和可视化提供开源工具。Bioconductor 多数软件包采用 R 统计编程语言开发。Bioconductor 每年释出两个版本，并有活跃的用户社区。"}],"

",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.bioconductor.org","rel":"nofollow","children":"Bioconductor"}]," 镜像源配置文件之一是 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"~/.Rprofile"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["注：R 的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"~"}]," 在类 Unix 系统下为：",["$r","code",null,{"children":"$HOME"}],"（即 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"~"}],"），在 Windows 下为：",["$r","code",null,{"children":"%USERPROFILE%\Documents"}],"，具体路径可以在 R 中执行 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"path.expand("~")"}]," 查看。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"在文末添加如下语句或在 R/RStudio 终端下键入："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"options(BioC_mirror="{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}")","codeLanguage":"r"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"即可使用该 Bioconductor 镜像源安装 Bioconductor 软件包。命令如下："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))

BiocManager::install("$package_name")","codeLanguage":"r"}],"

",["$r","li",null,{"children":["确保 BiocManager 的版本不低于 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"1.30.12"}],"。"]}],"

"]}],"
